description:
About Us

Ambercycle is a materials science company founded in 2015 to make the global fashion industry circular. Every year, over 120 billion garments are disposed of. We’re developing and scaling a breakthrough technology to manufacture yarns and fabrics from these end-of-life clothes, without a sacrifice in quality, rather than from petroleum or new agriculture resources. Our apparel products avoid the use of new raw materials and go into the highest quality applications, exceeding the expectations of end customers with a fraction of the environmental footprint. Using our technology, we are fundamentally changing the fashion industry and building the infinite textile ecosystem. Ambercycle’s first solution, cycora® is a premium fabric made from end-of-life textiles. For more information, visit www.ambercycle.com and @cycora.la on IG.

The Team

The Ambercycle Marketing team creates physical, digital, and offline experiences inspired by our community that foster connection, drive actionable change for the betterment of our planet, and invite people to participate in the cycora® ecosystem. We are optimistic, curious, resourceful, and fearless.

The Job

We are seeking a Partner Marketing Manager to collaborate with our brand partners' marketing teams to create meaningful campaigns that elevate the cycora® brand and uphold co-branding standards. Your role will involve developing and executing joint marketing initiatives that drive brand awareness and engagement on a global scale.

Who You Might Be
• A strategic collaborator: you work effectively with brand partners to develop and execute marketing campaigns that align with both cycora®'s and partners' objectives.
• A brand custodian: you ensure that all co-branded marketing materials and campaigns uphold cycora®'s brand guidelines and integrity.
• A creative marketer: you ideate and execute innovative and unique marketing campaigns that resonate with target audiences and differentiate the brands in the market.
• A results-driven marketer: you track and analyze campaign performance metrics to measure and report success and continually optimize current and future initiatives.
• A detail-oriented and highly organized professional: you manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring they stay on track and within scope.

Responsibilities
• A genuine interest and passion for creating the circular textile economy, ending textile 'waste', and making the world more sustainable.
• 3+ years of experience in partner marketing or brand management roles, preferably in a global or multi-market environment.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with external partners.
• Proven ability to develop and execute co-marketing strategies that drive mutual brand benefit and growth.
• Self-motivated, demonstrating a high level of initiative and proven ability to work on multiple projects in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing appropriately.
• Strong understanding of digital data analysis and social media KPIs; translating insights into actions.
• Impeccable attention to detail and creative eye.
• Experience in managing marketing campaigns from ideation to execution, with a focus on delivering measurable results.
• Fluency in Microsoft Office and Google Suite, including Excel and Sheets, as well as experience with project management software.

Qualifications
• A genuine interest and passion for creating the circular textile economy, ending textile 'waste', and making the world more sustainable.
• 5+ years of experience in partner marketing or brand management roles, preferably in a global or multi-market environment.
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with external partners.
• Proven ability to develop and execute co-marketing strategies that drive mutual brand benefit and growth.
• Self-motivated, demonstrating a high level of initiative and proven ability to work on multiple projects in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing appropriately.
• Strong understanding of digital data analysis and social media KPIs; translating insights into actions.
• Impeccable attention to detail and creative eye.
• Experience in managing marketing campaigns from ideation to execution, with a focus on delivering measurable results.
• Fluency in Microsoft Office and Google Suite, including Excel and Sheets, as well as experience with project management software.
• Bachelor's Degree (preferred).

Benefits
• Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance
• Flexible PTO
• 401(k)
• Free Healthy Snacks & Beverages
• Lunch Provided on Fridays
